architectural_elements.name: Tiled Walls
architectural_elements.description: Cracked ceramic tiles stained with mildew and dark streaks, some missing entirely to reveal the plaster beneath.

architectural_elements.name: Stone or Porcelain Floor
architectural_elements.description: Cold tiles slick with moisture, patterned with old stains and faint footprints.

architectural_elements.name: Bathtub
architectural_elements.description: A large clawfoot tub with rusted edges, half-filled with stagnant, dark water that ripples occasionally.

architectural_elements.name: Sink and Mirror
architectural_elements.description: An antique porcelain sink with rusted faucets and a cracked mirror above it, reflecting movement that isn’t there.

architectural_elements.name: Toilet and Plumbing
architectural_elements.description: An old-fashioned toilet with a hanging chain flush and visible rusted pipes along the walls.

furniture_and_decor.name: Medicine Cabinet
furniture_and_decor.description: A small metal cabinet above the sink containing dusty bottles, old bandages, and yellowed labels.

furniture_and_decor.name: Towel Rack
furniture_and_decor.description: A rusted rack holding a damp, discolored towel that drips onto the floor.

furniture_and_decor.name: Curtain Rod and Shower Curtain
furniture_and_decor.description: A torn shower curtain hanging halfway open, stained and swaying slightly as if recently disturbed.

furniture_and_decor.name: Laundry Basket
furniture_and_decor.description: A wicker basket filled with rotted fabric and moldy clothing.

furniture_and_decor.name: Vanity Table
furniture_and_decor.description: A small vanity with cracked glass jars, a broken comb, and traces of faded perfume.

atmospheric_details.name: Condensation and Drips
atmospheric_details.description: Water slowly dripping from the ceiling or taps, forming small ripples in puddles on the floor.

atmospheric_details.name: Fogged Mirror
atmospheric_details.description: The mirror fogs over and occasionally reveals words or handprints that vanish quickly.

atmospheric_details.name: Mold and Decay
atmospheric_details.description: Dark patches of mold creeping up the walls, emitting a musty odor.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Air
atmospheric_details.description: A chilling draft that emanates from the bathtub or through the drain.

atmospheric_details.name: Faint Whispers
atmospheric_details.description: Soft, echoing voices heard through the pipes or behind the walls.

interactive_objects.name: Mirror
interactive_objects.description: When interacted with, reflections behave unnaturally—delayed movements or figures appearing behind the player.

interactive_objects.name: Bathtub Drain
interactive_objects.description: A blackened drain that gurgles faintly; interacting may trigger a hand or object emerging from the water.

interactive_objects.name: Medicine Bottle
interactive_objects.description: A small glass vial containing a strange liquid or a key item for a puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Cabinet Drawer
interactive_objects.description: A drawer that opens slowly, revealing a torn photograph or cryptic note.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Light Fixture
interactive_objects.description: A ceiling lamp that flickers when touched, sometimes triggering supernatural events.

environmental_effects.name: Flickering Lights
environmental_effects.description: Overhead light bulbs that blink erratically, casting momentary darkness across the room.

environmental_effects.name: Dripping Echoes
environmental_effects.description: Loud, rhythmic drops of water echo through the space, syncing with the player’s heartbeat.

environmental_effects.name: Steam Clouds
environmental_effects.description: Mist forming near the bathtub or sink, occasionally revealing ghostly shapes.

environmental_effects.name: Mirror Apparitions
environmental_effects.description: Brief spectral reflections appearing behind the player before fading away.

environmental_effects.name: Water Ripple Movement
environmental_effects.description: Ripples forming in the tub even when the water appears still, as if something is moving beneath the surface.

lighting.name: Overhead Lamp
lighting.description: A single flickering light casting harsh shadows and highlighting the room’s decay.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Candles placed on the sink or tub edge, their wax pooled and blackened.

lighting.name: Moonlight Through Window
lighting.description: Soft light filtering through a fogged or cracked window, illuminating the mist.

lighting.name: Electrical Sparks
lighting.description: Occasional flickers of blue light from a damaged wire or fixture, briefly brightening the darkness.
